content: Investments Asked by Shabir KhanAsked on 12 Mar 2019Can i do short term trading with DBS Vickers Cash account? As i see that i have settle purchases at T+3.So, can i purchase 100 stocks on monday and sell them at a higher price on tuesday, without putting up any cash upfront1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 12 Mar 2019You are assuming the price can move that fast in less than 3 days.And don't forget there are still commission charges for buy/sell 2 ways. If you do 100 shares, the profit might not cover the commissions.Worst case to happen: Stock trading is halted by sgx. You have to cover the losses.0 comments1
